package.name: slugs
package.description:
This is a Catkinized, CMake port of the "SmalL bUt Complete GROne Synthesizer" (SLUGS) SLUGS is a stand-alone reactive synthesis tool for generalized reactivity(1) synthesis.

See LICENSE.txt
package.author: Spyros Maniatopoulos
